entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 08:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Snow with ice pellets late this morning and this afternoon and with periods of drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of drizzle this evening and then to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
